name: Obsidian++
description:
From beyond the edge of time and space, the Obsidian Dragon has invaded our world. It is up to our four heroines to defeat the eponymous dragon and save our world!

This is a short game with only a single boss battle lasting 5-10 minutes. Now with difficulty selection, achievements, equipment, and way more Lithomancy skills!

This is the latest updated version. The older, game jam version can be found here.

Credits:

Graphics: Avery, KADOKAWA/Komodo, SkottyTV

Sound & Music: KADOKAWA/Komodo, YouFulca

Plugins: Aloe Guvner, Atreyo Ray, Caethyril, Casper Gaming, Felski, Galv, HimeWorks, Jeneeus Guruman, mjshi, Rocketmancer, SumRndmDde, Victor Sant, Vlue, Yami, Yanfly, Zevia
